subject: Speed Limits and Speeding
Baseball
Roads and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig was arrested near Naples, Fla., after officers clocked him driving at 110 miles per hour in a 70-m.p.h. zone.
snippet: Los Angeles Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig was arrested near Naples, Fla., after officers clocked him driving at 110 miles per hour in a 70-m.p.h. zone.
